title: About Us | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: SITLEARN is the lifelong learning division of Singapore Institute of Technology, Singapore's first University of Applied Learning.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses

is the lifelong learning division of Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT), Singapore's first University of Applied Learning. We focus on providing lifelong learning opportunities for working adults to upgrade their skills and knowledge for the workplace.

We aim to be a key continuing education and training partner in Singapore, supporting the SkillsFuture movement by cultivating thinking tinkerers, lifelong learners, and catalysts for workforce transformation.

We empower learners to innovate with industry, keeping pace with the ever-changing needs of the workforce. With a strong focus on authentic learning in a real-world environment, we aim to equip learners with the skills and knowledge they need to excel in their careers and make a meaningful contribution to society.

Our lifelong learning courses are designed to help organisations grow talent by equipping their employees with new skills and knowledge. This not only fosters strong relationships between employers and employees, it also creates opportunities for career growth and high-performance teams.

Our courses focus on applied learning, enabling learners to apply the skills and knowledge they acquire to their specific contexts and desired outcomes. The courses frequently blend theory with practical or lab sessions to facilitate effective learning transfer. This provide learners with authentic learning experiences that add value to their skillset.

Our trainers are highly engaging and industry-specific, comprising university faculty with domain expertise, thought leaders and industry practitioners. These trainers bring real-world experience to the learning environment, creating an engaging and interactive experience for learners.
Over the years, we have impacted over 25,000 participants from 1,300 companies, helping them to maximise their potential and develop market-relevant skills.
Our courses emphasise the integration of theory and hands-on application, enabling learners to gain practical experience and real-world skills.
We work closely with industry partners, trade associations, agencies and ministries to align our courses with Industry Transformation Maps and SkillsFuture Singapore's Skills Framework.
Our courses are regularly reviewed to reflect emerging trends and developments. This ensures that learners leave with the skills and knowledge needed to succeed.
Partnerships with Industry and Community at SIT Punggol Campus

We take pride in our symbiotic partnership with industry and community, which allows us to offer courses that are relevant, up-to-date, and aligned with the latest trends and technologies. We also tap on our extensive network of overseas university partners to respond to new or evolving industry needs. At the heart of our courses are training solutions that support workplace transformation.
Our strategic location at the heart of
has transformed our industry and community partnerships, creating a dynamic innovation ecosystem where learning and application converge.

Our purpose-built campus facilities - featuring specialised laboratories, collaborative innovation spaces, and technology-enabled learning environments - serve as the physical nexus between academia and industry, fostering spontaneous collaboration and knowledge exchange.
Discover courses that can enhance your skillset, elevate your career, and take it to the next level.
Our portfolio of short SkillsFuture-funded courses will help you contextualise and apply concepts to tackle real-world challenges.
Whether you are looking to enhance your skills or explore new areas of expertise, our learning pathways provide the flexibility and recognition you need to succeed.
Advance your career with industry-recognised licences and certificates through preparatory courses or examinations.
Enhance your employability in new sectors or job roles through the SkillsFuture Career Transition Programme.
Transform your organisation with customised learning solutions

Tailored to your organisation's specific training needs, we can help you design and develop custom courses to grow key talent and develop specialist expertise to meet the demands of the future of work.

Are you on the lookout for a ready pool of talent to join your organisation? Eager to make an impact by providing work attachment opportunities for trainees? Start your journey with us and tap into our talent pool through the SkillsFuture Career Transition Programme.
Subscribe now and receive our brochure for the latest updates on our courses, events and insights.

We look forward to journeying with you on your path of lifelong learning. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the links provided in our communications. To learn more about how SIT protects your personal data, you may refer to SIT's Personal Data Protection Policy
